actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to apply the rates of duty in effect on January 1, 1995, to certain water resistant wool trousers.

summary.text: Applies the rates of duty effective after December 31, 1994, under the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to certain water resistant wool trousers that were entered, or withdrawn from warehouse for consumption, after December 31, 1988, and before January 1, 1995.

titles.title: A bill to apply the rates of duty in effect on January 1, 1995, to certain water resistant wool trousers.
